page.title: 01 ASH DISTRICT
page.content: Our Domesday block covers the village of Ash and the small hamlets of Coat, Milton and Witcombe. The few houses around Stapleton Cross are included and so are the housing estates nearer Martock. Some of these houses are council houses while the others are privately built. Only a few people live in our area as most of the land is used for farming. The main kind of farming is dairy farming but there is at least one pig farm. There is no heavy industry but there is an industrial estate of abouttwenty five firms situated on the site of the old Martock/Yeovil railway line. Some of these firms are trading companies while others make different things. Ash Primary School provides the education in our area.
